[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@dual-lab/meta-commander](./meta-commander.md) &gt; [OptionConfig](./meta-commander.optionconfig.md) &gt; [longName](./meta-commander.optionconfig.longname.md)

## OptionConfig.longName property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The long option name. If camel case it will be trasformed into kebabe case. If not specified it will be inferred from the name of the field or method. To suppress long name put equal to `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
longName?: string;
```

## Remarks

Can be suppressed only if the `shortName` is not

## Example 1


```typescript

@MetaCommand
class MyCli {
 @MetaOption({
   shortName: 'd'
   longName: 'debugEnabled'
 })
 debug?: boolean;
}


```

## Example 2


```bash
my-cli --debug-enabled


```
